resources.string: You must have goofed up somewhere!
No runs are recorded. Get out and get moving! Press the button below or select "New Run" from the overflow menu to record a run.
Your run is being monitored in the background
You are more than 100 meters from where this run originally ended; you can\'t \"continue\" it from here. Cancelling further tracking of this run.
Starting Date update failed! No rows were updated!
Starting Address update failed! No rows were updated!
Starting Address update failed! Multiple rows were updated!
Error! Unknown return value from Starting Address update!
Starting Date and Starting Address update failed! Multiple rows were updated!
Error! Unknown return value from Starting Date update!
Ending Address update failed! No rows were updated!
Ending Address update failed! Multiple rows were updated!
Error! Unknown return value from Ending Address update!

resources.string: Error inserting new Run! Error code %1$d

GoogleApiClient connection suspended - Remote service disconnected! Trying to fix…

Please grant location access so this app can track your runs!
Because location access has not been granted, this app will not be able to track new runs.
